posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a nice example of Naps Portrait.
VCP on this card is $709, with the 2 most recent recorded sales going for $750.

Selling for $700 - $50 of which will go directly to Rady's Children's Hospital here in San Diego (donation link to follow).

As some of you are aware, Rady's provided critical help to my family earlier this year.
Over the last couple weeks, I've been pushing hard to fundraise, specifically for their Pediatric Cancer Program.

I'm happy to answer questions regarding any of this - the card, the fundraiser, any of it.
Rady's provided immeasurable support to my family, and this is a small way I can show my gratitude.

Thank you for looking!

Fundraiser Link: [url]http://give.rchsd.org/site/TR/DIY/LighttheWay?px=1026751&pg=personal&fr_id=1190[/url]

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20191111/c039d2773d5dd94a732c25e0cde8a077.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20191111/a1cb232bc8bd6192a67280e6b33b06fb.jpg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
